description:
Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia’s attack. The Four Outer Guardians entrust Sailor Moon to the Star Lights while they try to stop Galaxia...
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ginga no Shihaisha Galaxia no Kyoui
La soberana de la Vía Lactea. La amenaza de Galaxia.
Ruler of the Galaxy: The Menace of Galaxia
銀河の支配者ギャラクシアの脅威
